job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
This Jobot Job is hosted by Danielle Wilson
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
International specialist insurer industry and established in 2006 to focus primarily on the needs of small and middle market commercial clients seeking a Site Reliability Engineer to join the rapidly growing and evolving IT Organization. This role will be responsible for maintaining operational coverage of platforms offered through the cloud, on-premises and hybrid with a focus on improving automation, scale, process, data collection and visibility into production health and reliability by enhancing existing tools, developing new tools through continuous integration, automated testing, and delivery.
Competitive salary and bonus (based on personal & company performance)
Comprehensive health insurance, Vision, Dental and FSA
401(k) with competitive company matching
Paid Time Off
Modern and open office spaces, complimentary fruit and drinks
MUST HAVES
PLUSES
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
